mainDescription.value: Summer incl. hiking pass ! Nice and cosy traditionel alpin chalet hotel in quiet surroundings with panoramic outlook. Managed by the owner. Tasteful rooms with all facilities. Restaurants "Gaststube" and "Kaminstübli" for a nice dinner and a bar for a nice get together. Wellness with sauna, sanarium, steambath, sauna in the garden with cold water, hot pot, relaxroom with fire place, div. massage and a fitness-studio. A hideaway for travellers that prefer a boutique style hotel.
